remarks: Lemma factoring out common proof steps in ~ r2exf an ~ r2ex . Introduced to reduce dependencies on axioms.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 10-Jan-2020.)
statement:
r2exlem.1 $e |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. B -. ph <-> A. x A. y ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> -. ph ) ) $.
r2exlem $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ph <-> E. x E. y ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ph ) ) $.
